materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a road in Buitenzorg (Bogor) in Indonesia. There is a wide empty dirt road in the center of the photograph. On either side of the photograph, there are rows of Banyan trees, creating a canopy over the road. The top-right corner of the photograph is slightly folded. The title is handwritten at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Avenue of Trees in the park of Governor General, Buitenzorg, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Bogor (Indonesia) Banyan tree
